Exploitation of Literature on Tape .A Rowlands, D.G. Experience of the use of a number of commercially available magnetic tapes for a current awareness service is described.. Difficulties encountered in the assimilation of various types of tape format into the system developed for the Unilever Research Laboratory are discussed, and problems in the retrospective searching of tapes are outlined.. .X 18	1	467 58	1	467 125	1	467 145	1	467 164	2	467 211	1	467 224	1	467 274	1	467 378	1	467 440	1	467 452	1	467 453	1	467 457	1	467 467	5	467 468	1	467 490	1	467 491	1	467 495	1	467 506	2	467 508	1	467 511	1	467 512	1	467 514	1	467 517	1	467 520	1	467 521	1	467 523	1	467 524	1	467 526	1	467 528	1	467 576	1	467 580	1	467 604	2	467 609	3	467 612	1	467 619	1	467 622	1	467 623	1	467 629	1	467 631	1	467 632	1	467 633	1	467 699	1	467 700	1	467 705	1	467 707	1	467 723	1	467 726	1	467 727	1	467 728	1	467 729	1	467 730	1	467 731	1	467 754	1	467 812	1	467 813	2	467 814	2	467 820	1	467 822	1	467 866	1	467 870	1	467 873	1	467 1078	1	467 1089	1	467 1091	1	467 1143	1	467 1264	1	467 1298	1	467 1302	1	467 1303	1	467 1366	1	467 1367	1	467 1368	1	467 1396	2	467 1396	2	467
